channel.title: 2 Qs on attacking errors
channel.description:
Attacking Error 1) OK, when I use a melee weapon and attack a player, it hits them. Then when they walk away, my character doesn't follow them and they still get damaged. My character doesn't move, and still they get damaged even if they are far away. Does anyone know how to solve this?
2) [b]Sometimes[/b] when I click to attack somebody, it does the hitting emote but the other player doesn't get hit at all. I have to wait a few seconds then click on them again for it to attack properly. Why is this?

item.title: 2 Qs on attacking errors

item.title: 2 Qs on attacking errors
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

Says “cannot find symbol: EnemyX and EnemyY”

I added it to -

//Attacking in wilderness

So it looks like -

//Attacking in wilderness if (IsAttacking == true && IsDead == false && PkingDelay <= 0) { if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, EnemyX, EnemyY ,1) == true){ if (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null) { if (PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].IsDead == false) { Attack(); } } else { ResetAttack(); } } else { ResetAttack(); } }

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Qs on attacking errors
item.dc:creator: @kiaz kiaz
item.description:
@kiaz wrote:

  1. OK, when I use a melee weapon and attack a player, it hits them. Then when they walk away, my character doesn’t follow them and they still get damaged. My character doesn’t move, and still they get damaged even if they are far away. Does anyone know how to solve this?[/quote]

this is caused by not setting the distance

if(GoodDistance2(absX, absY, EnemyX, EnemyY ,1) == true){ // attacking code }

not too sure on number 2

Read full topic

item.title: 2 Qs on attacking errors
item.dc:creator: @NexondotNet NexondotNet
item.description:
@NexondotNet wrote:

Attacking Error

  1. OK, when I use a melee weapon and attack a player, it hits them. Then when they walk away, my character doesn’t follow them and they still get damaged. My character doesn’t move, and still they get damaged even if they are far away. Does anyone know how to solve this?

  2. Sometimes when I click to attack somebody, it does the hitting emote but the other player doesn’t get hit at all. I have to wait a few seconds then click on them again for it to attack properly. Why is this?

Read full topic
